11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: (Another chain similar to the narration as no. 1095) :Others have reported this Hadith from Ibn Uyainah, from Az-Zuhri, from Anas, and they did not mention "from Wa'il, from his son Nawf" in it

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About (Al-Walimah) The Banquet
